name: Qbi & Tes DEMO
description:
Qbi is back, and there are yet still dormant lightbulbs in the world that need to be lit! With his firing mechanism fixed, he has more control over his shots! But he can't save the world alone. He's gonna need some help from Tes!

________________________

Controls:

Move: WASD or arrow keys

Swap Character: Enter

Restart Level: R

Exit Level: Backspace

BUY THE FULL GAME HERE
